questionText: Various treatments for osteoarthritis have proved effective in relieving pain.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: None of the various treatments for osteoarthritis have proved to be a cure.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: In 2000 the FDA approved meloxican tablets (Mobic).
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Several dietary supplements are claimed by some patients to be effective.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: The Jacobson resonance machine  emits a weak magnetic field.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: The 'placebo effect is when the patient imagines effectiveness.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Researchers are also looking at an antibiotic doxycycline.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Knee replacement can restore mobility.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: There is no cure for osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Osteoarthritis can be treated with Ibuprofen.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: The FDA approved meloxican tablets for the treatment of osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: HMP-33 is a ginger extract.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: A Jacobson resonance machine emits a weak magnetic field.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Researchers are testing doxycycline for the treatment of osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Hip replacement can restore mobility in some sufferers of osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Experts agree that weight loss helps in the treatment of osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: 18.5 million Americans are affected by osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Most sufferers of osteoarthritis are over 45.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Osteoarthritis breaks down cartilage of the bones.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Acetaminophen is used to treat osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Surgery is often used to treat osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Some people believe acupuncture can treat osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Research has raised doubts about nontraditional treatments of osteoarthritis.
author: AGA1PIIWM8I8D

questionText: Osteoarthritis is the most common type of arthritis.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Osteoarthritis is a degenerative joint disease.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Osteoarthritis causes pain and limits movement.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Pain relievers and anti-inflammatory drugs help ease the symptoms.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Surgery is used to relieve pain from Osteoarthritis.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Exercise and weight control can treat Osteoarthritis.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Osteoarthritis is most often found in the fingers and weight-bearing joints.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: COX-2 inhibitors are used to reduce inflammation.
author: AB5IVPS4OP9M8

questionText: Other non-traditional treatments include ginger extract HMP-33.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Electromagnetic resonance is still being tested.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Studies on acupuncture suggest improvement may be psychological.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Research shows HMP-33 give relief from pain with no negative side effects.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Weight loss is recommended.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: There is no evidence to back up claims of copper bracelets.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Three new NSAIDS containing COX-2 (cyclooxygenase-2) inhibitors have been developed.
author: A249LDVPG27XCE

questionText: Acetaminophens treat pain.
author: AK3H5QRAROFGP

questionText: Hyaluronan is an injectable drug.
author: AK3H5QRAROFGP

questionText: Nutritional supplements are trendy for treating osteoarthritis.
author: AK3H5QRAROFGP

questionText: Meloxicam causes few gastrointestinal complications.
author: AK3H5QRAROFGP

questionText: There is no evidence to support the effectiveness of copper bracelets.
author: AK3H5QRAROFGP

questionText: The treatment of osteoarthritis includes the use of aspirin.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs cause liver damage.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs cause gastrointestinal bleeding.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: New cox-2 inhibitor drugs have fewer gastrointestinal side effects.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Vitamin E eases arthritis pain.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Copper bracelets have been proven ineffective.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Tai chi has not been proven effective.
author: A3TS2NCBAB9L6V

questionText: Studies show that glucosamine relieves pain.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Beta-carotene reduces the risk of osteoarthritis.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The FDA is studying the use of electromagnetic resonance.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: No studies yet support the effectiveness of Tai chi.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: No studies yet support the effectiveness of acupuncture.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: No studies yet support the effectiveness of methyl sulfonyl methane.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Chondroitin stops joint degeneration.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Vitamin C reduces the risk of osteoarthritis.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y
